game.name: Forza Horizon 5
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Co-op, Online Co-op, Cross-Platform Multiplayer, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Cloud, HDR available, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 세계 최고의 자동차를 타고 생동감 넘치는 멕시코의 대자연을 탐험하며 재미있는 드라이빙 액션을 마음껏 즐겨보세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Explore the vibrant open world landscapes of Mexico with limitless, fun driving action in the world’s greatest cars.

reviewHighlights.text: If you’re reading this during the Winter Sale, now is a great time to pick up this game while it’s still available. Like previous Forza Horizon titles...
only worth it on sale. very fun but it is like a 2 week minecraft phase (that lasts 3 days) not a bad game but can get boring fast with its repetitive...
